resources.string: DesktopSMS forwards your SMS to your Google Talk and/or Gmail. And reply back to respond via text!
Login failed. Please verify your internet connection and try again. Logging in with a Google Apps email address may not work. If the error persists, please send a log to the developer.

Desktop SMS will now ask you for permission to use your Google Account authentication for the purposes of push notifications and registration with our server. Desktop SMS will not have access to your passwords or personal data.
Please log in with your Google Account to use DesktopSMS.
Press OK to send a SMS to yourself. You should see the SMS arrive in your Messaging application as usual. You should also receive an email and optionally a Google Talk message as well!
This is a test message from DesktopSMS!
Unable to retrieve your phone number. Please use your Messaging application to manually send yourself a text message to test Desktop SMS.
